sourcesContent:
<template>
    <ManageAlbumCreate></ManageAlbumCreate>
    <b-tab title="消息管理" active>
        <b-row>
            <b-col md="3">
                <b-list-group v-for="(item,index) in albums" :key="index">
                    <b-list-group-item active v-if="index == editing.current" @click="select(index)">
                        <b-badge>{{ item.id }}</b-badge>
                        {{ item.name }}
                    </b-list-group-item>
                    <b-list-group-item v-if="index != editing.current" @click="select(index)">
                        <b-badge>{{ item.id }}</b-badge>
                        {{ item.name }}
                    </b-list-group-item>
                </b-list-group>
            </b-col>
            <b-col md="9">
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">相簿編號</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input v-model="editing.data.id" placeholder="Enter your name" disabled></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">相簿名稱</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input v-model="editing.data.name" placeholder="Enter your name"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">內文</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-textarea
                            id="textarea"
                            v-model="editing.data.context"
                            placeholder="Enter something..."
                            rows="10"
                            max-rows="6"
                            >
                        </b-form-textarea>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">編輯者</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input disabled v-model="editing.data.editor" placeholder="Enter your name"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row>
                    <b-col md="12 text-center">
                        <b-button variant="success m-2" @click="updateData(editing.data.id)">更新</b-button>
                        <b-button variant="danger m-2" @click="deleteData(editing.data.id)">刪除</b-button>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>    
            </b-col>
        </b-row>
    </b-tab>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';
import ManageAlbumCreate from '../components/Manage-Album-Create.vue';

export default {
    name: 'App',
    components: {
        ManageAlbumCreate
    },
    data(){
        return {
            albums: [],
            editing: {
                current: 0,
                data: []
            }
        }
    },
    created(){
        axios
            .get('http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/public/api/album')
            .then(response => {
                this.albums = response.data.data;
                this.editing.data = this.albums[0];
            })
            .catch(error => {
                console.error(error);
            });
    },
    computed:{
    },
    methods: 
    {
        updateData(id){
            console.log(id);
        },
        deleteData(id){
            console.log(id);
        },
        select(num){
            this.editing.current = num;
            this.editing.data = this.albums[num];
        }
    }
}
</script>
